title: (x) Serial Cut serif headlines - ITC Caslon No. 224 {Stephen}
content:
This Display serif looks like it could be a DTL font, but I'm really unsure. Any ideas?

[http://www.serialcut.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035207/http:/www.serialcut.com/ "http://www.serialcut.com/")
author: Tyler Lang

comments.content: It's a display cut of Caslon like [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035207/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Caslon%20Graphique).

Oh, I was close. It's a nicely tightly spaced [ITC Caslon No. 224 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035207/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125946.0.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Qompendium+at+Neo2&sampleSize=48)
